adDetails: AA TAX SERVICE 478 E Santa Clara St # 206,San Jose,CA 95112(Corner of 11th St, next 7-11 store) show contact info OR 280-7569 -TO SET UP A NEW BUSINESS PAYROLL PROCESSING. -NEW HIRE REPORTING. -PAYROLL SERVICE TO ANY CITY AND STATE IN AMERICA. -OUR FEE INCLUDING QUARTERLY & YEARLY REPORTS (940,941,DE 9, DE9C,W2, & W3). We accept payroll data via fax,email and telephone. -DO 1099 & 1096 FOR INDEPENDENT CONTRACTORS. -EMPLOYEE'S YEAR TO DATE TOTALS. -TOTAL HOURS, INCOME, CURRENT AND YEAR TO DATE. -INFORMATION ON FEDERAL, STATE AND LOCAL TAX DEPOSITS. WE FILE FEDERAL AND STATE PAYROLL TAXES & DIRECT DEPOSIT. WE FILE AND MAKE ALL PAYROLL TAX PAYMENTS WHETHER MONTHLY,QUARTERLY OR YEARLY REPORTS. WE ALSO PROVIDE THE BOOKKEEPING AND TAX SERVICE. OVER 20+YRS EXPERIENCE
